org.apache.algorithms

Class SuffixArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.algorithms.SuffixArray
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Global

    public class SuffixArray
extends java.lang.Object
implements Global
    SuffixArray Class by implementing CD3 algorithm, which is a linear time method building suffix array.
    Author:
    yonghuiwu

      • insert_SF_tree

        private void insert_SF_tree(int poss,
                  int d,
                  int node)
        # insert the suffix string [pos: ] into node with node number of 'node' # when matching a suffix [pos: ] on the edge [start: end] of the right most child, only 3 result: # 1. nstart = start, not a single charactor matched. 2. nstart == end, the current edge is mached as part of suffix [pos: ] 3. start < nstart < end, denoting the matching stopped at a midian position between start and end, we need to split the node. The suffix never will exhausted before the edge, since the 0 will be complimented after the charactors were over, and 0 < all the charactors, and the suffix is > edge. Thus, it never gona happen.

      • SAsearch
